text:
We are using your data because you have given your consent.
We may process your data so that we can send you occasional emails relating to mentoring, MentorNet, best practices, webinars or events we may be running (typically no more than 5-12 per year).  We will only process data in accordance with applicable legislation including DPA and GDPR.
We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits.
However, some organisations which provide services to us may transfer personal data outside of the EEA, but we'll only allow them to do so if your data is adequately protected.
Your personal data will be held by sfG Software Ltd until you notify us that you no longer wish to receive information from us.
